info.name: GameVault API - Real Games Edition
info.description:
GameVault API with 50+ real games pre-loaded.

## Setup:
1. Update Register/Login with YOUR email and password
2. Login once to get token
3. Start adding real games from the collection

All games are real titles from popular franchises!
